subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls’ new $150 million, 25,000-seat, European-style, soccer-only building is about 55 percent complete and will be ready for the start of the 2010 season.
snippet: The Red Bulls’ new $150 million, 25,000-seat, European-style, soccer-only building is about 55 percent complete and will be ready for the start of the 2010 season.
